name: Car Stunt Race: Fun Racing
description:
Well you want to go crazy? Do you have steel nerves to dance on the running cars.

Then 'Reckless Death' game is for YOU.

max got a death-wish and he's dancing on the front of your car. Will your driving skills keep him safe? This crazy driving game has you as the stunt driver on the shoot of a music video.

Believe me this is not yet another simple car racing game it has more than we can describe it here.

IT IS MUCH INTERESTING AND ENTERTAINING THAN IT SOUNDS.
